# Output

**Associated Type**

The output that this tool produces for the language model to reason about in subsequent interactions.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Output : PromptRepresentable
```

## Discussion

Typically output is either a `String` or a [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/Generable] type.

## Invoking a tool

- **call(arguments:)**: A language model will call this method when it wants to leverage this tool.
- **Arguments**: The arguments that this tool should accept.

items.description: A language model will call this method when it wants to leverage this tool.
